subsubsection.title: Vocabulary
subsubsection.p:
Look up the definitions of new terms in the Glossary.
Rational exponent

li.p: To compute a^{m/n}, we can compute the nth root first, or the mth power, whichever is easier.
The graphs of power functions y = x^{m/n}, where m/n is positive, are all increasing for x\ge 0. If m/n\gt 1, the graph is concave up. If 0 \lt m/n \lt 1, the graph is concave down.
Powers with rational exponentspositive, negative, or zeroobey the laws of exponents.
To solve the equation x^{m/n} = k, we raise both sides to the power n/m.
What does the notation a^{0.98} mean?
Explain how to evaluate the function f (x) = x^{-3/4} for x = 625, without using a calculator.
What is the first step in solving the equation (x - 2)^{-5/2} = 1.8?
If the graph of f (x) = x^{a/b} is concave down, and a/b \gt 0, what else can you say about a/b?
